description: A React application that lets users define specifications with value-to-SKU code mappings, enabling auto-generation of SKU codes in a spreadsheet interface

items.description: Initialize React project with Vite, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, Framer Motion, Zustand, and Fortune-Sheet
stepsToVerify: Run 'npm create vite@latest' with react-ts template
Install all dependencies: zustand, framer-motion, @fortune-sheet/react, tailwindcss
Configure Tailwind CSS with tailwind.config.js and postcss.config.js
Initialize shadcn/ui and add required components (button, card, dialog, sidebar, tabs, input)
Verify 'npm run dev' starts the development server without errors

items.description: Define TypeScript interfaces for Specification, SpecValue, and related types
stepsToVerify: Create src/types/index.ts with SpecValue interface (id, label, skuCode)
Create Specification interface (id, name, values array, columnIndex)
Create SheetConfig interface for multi-sheet support
Create AppSettings interface for SKU delimiter and prefix/suffix options
Verify TypeScript compiles without errors

items.description: Implement Zustand stores with localStorage persistence for specifications, sheets, and settings
stepsToVerify: Create src/store/specifications.ts with CRUD operations for specs and values
Create src/store/sheets.ts for multi-sheet management
Create src/store/settings.ts for app configuration (delimiter, prefix, suffix)
Verify stores persist to localStorage on changes
Verify stores rehydrate from localStorage on page reload

items.description: Implement core SKU generation function that combines SKU codes from selected specification values
stepsToVerify: Create src/lib/sku-generator.ts with generateSKU function
Function takes selected values (Map of specId to label) and specifications array
Function looks up skuCode for each selected label
Function joins codes with configurable delimiter (default '-')
Function supports optional prefix and suffix
Test: Temperature='29deg C' (29C) + Color='Red' (R) = '29C-R'

items.description: Create sidebar UI for managing specifications and their values with Framer Motion animations
stepsToVerify: Create SpecificationList component with animated list (add/remove animations)
Create SpecificationItem component with expand/collapse animation
Create SpecificationForm dialog for adding/editing specification names
Create SpecValueForm for adding values with label and SKU code fields
Enable drag-to-reorder for specifications
Verify adding a spec with values 'Red' -> 'R' appears correctly

items.description: Integrate Fortune-Sheet spreadsheet with dropdown validation for specification columns
stepsToVerify: Create SpreadsheetContainer component wrapping Fortune-Sheet Workbook
Create useSpreadsheet hook for Fortune-Sheet API interactions
Generate header row from specification names plus 'SKU' column
Apply dataVerification (dropdown) to each spec column with spec values as options
Verify clicking a cell shows dropdown with spec values

items.description: Automatically update SKU column when specification values are selected in a row
stepsToVerify: Listen to onCellUpdated callback from Fortune-Sheet
When a spec column value changes, collect all values in that row
Call generateSKU with collected values
Update the SKU column cell with generated SKU
Test: Select 'Temperature: 29deg C' and 'Color: Red' -> SKU shows '29C-R'

items.description: Support multiple spreadsheet tabs with independent data
stepsToVerify: Create SheetTabs component showing tab bar at bottom of spreadsheet
Support adding new sheets via '+' button
Support renaming sheets (double-click tab)
Support deleting sheets (X button on tab)
Verify each sheet maintains independent data
Verify switching tabs shows correct sheet content

items.description: Create main application layout with collapsible sidebar and spreadsheet area
stepsToVerify: Create AppLayout component with shadcn/ui SidebarProvider
Left sidebar contains specification management
Main area contains spreadsheet with sheet tabs below
Header with app title and sidebar toggle button
Sidebar should be collapsible/expandable

items.description: Support importing and exporting spreadsheet data to Excel and CSV formats
stepsToVerify: Create export.ts with exportToExcel function using Fortune-Sheet export
Create exportToCSV function for CSV download
Create importFromExcel function for loading Excel files
Add Import/Export buttons to header or settings
Verify exported Excel opens correctly in Excel/Google Sheets
Verify importing an Excel file loads data into spreadsheet

items.description: Allow users to configure SKU generation settings (delimiter, prefix, suffix)
stepsToVerify: Create Settings dialog accessible from sidebar footer
Setting: SKU delimiter (default '-', options: '-', '_', '', custom)
Setting: SKU prefix (optional string prepended to all SKUs)
Setting: SKU suffix (optional string appended to all SKUs)
Settings persist to localStorage
Changing settings triggers SKU recalculation for all rows

items.description: Complete workflow test from spec creation to SKU generation
stepsToVerify: Create specification 'Temperature' with values: '29deg C' -> '29C', '30deg C' -> '30C'
Create specification 'Color' with values: 'Red' -> 'R', 'Blue' -> 'B'
Create specification 'Type' with values: 'Standard' -> 'STD', 'Premium' -> 'PRM'
Verify spreadsheet shows columns: Temperature, Color, Type, SKU
Select '29deg C', 'Red', 'Standard' in row 2
Verify SKU column shows '29C-R-STD'
Change Color to 'Blue' -> SKU updates to '29C-B-STD'
Export to Excel and verify data integrity
